mapper.sql: ID_, P_DRIVER, P_URL, P_USER_NAME, P_PASSWORD, DEL_FLAG, P_NAME, P_REMARK
mapper.insert:

ID_,
P_DRIVER,
P_URL,
P_USER_NAME,
P_PASSWORD,
DEL_FLAG,
P_NAME,
P_REMARK,

mapper.update:
update P_DS_OBJ
P_DRIVER = #{pDriver,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_URL = #{pUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_USER_NAME = #{pUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_PASSWORD = #{pPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_NAME = #{pName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_REMARK = #{pRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID_ = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM P_DS_OBJ T WHERE T.DEL_FLAG = '1' AND T.ID_ = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into P_DS_OBJ
ID_,
P_DRIVER,
P_URL,
P_USER_NAME,
P_PASSWORD,
DEL_FLAG,
P_NAME,
P_REMARK,

mapper.update: UPDATE P_DS_OBJ T SET T.P_DRIVER = #{pDriver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, T.P_URL = #{pUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, T.P_USER_NAME = #{pUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, T.P_PASSWORD = #{pPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, T.P_NAME = #{pName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, T.P_REMARK = #{pRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE T.ID_ = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE P_DS_OBJ T SET T.DEL_FLAG = '0' WHERE
(T.ID_ = #{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
